resources.string: Please close my charging flap then start the action you want
There is a problem on server
Please bring me to the mapFrame before localize and start service
Please localize me before start service
Navigation Cancelled, please bring me to the base before relocalize
You call me, how can i help you?
They sent me to you, what can I do?
You have altered vital signs, are you feeling well? If you want, I can call a doctor
There is poor light, do you want to turn on the light?
There is too much light, do you want to turn off the light?
There\'s a little too much spoiled air, do you want to open the window?
It\'s a bit cold, do you want to turn on the heating?
It\'s a little hot, do you want to turn on the air conditioning?
It\'s a little humid here, do you want to turn on the air conditioning?
